---
title: "`ramp.forcing`"
subtitle: "Models with Forcing (including Weather) for `ramp.xds`"
---

***

[**`ramp.forcing`**](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.forcing/) is an R-package available from github. It supports models for effects of weather affecting mosquito bionomic and ecology, and other parameters affecting malaria transmission. Malaria control, including vector control, is implemented in [**`ramp.control`**](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.control/)

To install the latest version of **`ramp.forcing`** from GitHub, run the following lines of code in an R session.

```{r, eval=F}
library(devtools)
devtools::install_github("dd-harp/ramp.forcing")
```

**`ramp.forcing`** depends on [**`ramp.xds`**](ramp.xds.html)
